item.description:
Please consider joining us every 2nd Saturday of the month to watch a movie in Spanish. You will be provided with verbs and quotes from the movie feature, Pop Corn & Drinks. The movie we'll be watching is: Under the Same Moon: The debut feature from director Patricia Riggen, this drama centers on a young boy's journey across the U.S./Mexico border to be reunited with his mother. Adrian Alonso stars as Carlitos, a Mexican adolescent living with his grandmother while his mother works as a maid in the U.S., hoping someday to send for her child. But when the grandmother dies unexpectedly, Carlitos must sneak across the border and seek out his mother. Featuring a supporting performance by America Ferrera of ABC's Ugly Betty, Under the Same Moon premiered at the 2007 Sundance Film Festival, where it received a standing ovation.

Join us to watch this love story. At the end of the movie you will be given a CD with Spanish music, with current and classics for your enjoyment and practice!
item.how_to_find_us: You can text me or call me at (617) 412-8965 if you get lost or need Directions!

group.name: South Shore Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Pelicula "La Misma Luna"
